titleStmt.title: Reflections on that discourse, which a Master of Arts (once) of the University of Cambridg, calls rational presented in print to a person of honour, 1676, concerning transubstantiation / by one of no arts but down-right honesty, at the instance of an honourable person.
titleStmt.author: Anglesey, Arthur Annesley, Earl of, 1614-1686.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Arthur Annesley, Earl of Anglesey. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
